Articles.Content:
As was requested due to my experience in spaceplane design (not flight, design...) I decided to take it upon myself to create the craziest plane I could. I thought for a bit about what could I do to make a crazy plane, and I got an eureka moment - a supersonic floatplane!

I set to work designing, and my ingenuity created this marvelous creation - the X-1 Floating

Going low over the ocean. This was like 40s after takeoff and we were already hitting Mach 2... What kind of beast did I create?

Touchdown successful. That's a ribbon for you Jeb (Final Frontier best mod 2015)

Can she take off again though? If not she'd make a nice and speedy ship

That she can (or maybe just because of x4 timewarp). I'm glad that exists!

Just to see what she could do I sped from where I took off from and then shut my engines off over the KSC. She landed on the land branch on the desert continent to the left of the Africa-like continent the KSC is on only a minute later.

I've created a demon guys. It can probably go Mach 5 but I went to high and the engines shut down...

I might leave a download link if anybody wants it, but I don't really think they would, except to destroy planets

I like the part where it was only going to go Mach 2 at best but ended up being a hypersonic craft. That can land on water...

P.S. I had my re-entry heat turned down to 60% on this save because I find it more fun to see how fast I can make a craft go, and I don't like it blowing up at 1400m/s

Edited November 13, 2015 by doxlulzem
You might want to stick some radiators on it if you don't like blowing up at 1400 m.s. It worked on one of my planes although I haven't fully tested it.
I'll try that next time I play career then sounds like a good idea to stop my engine clusters from overheating
Looks great! It could probably go into space if you aimed it up.
